en.title: Strawbees CODE - BETA Preview
en.content: You're previewing the **beta version** of our new editor, if you have suggestions or if something doesn't work as expected, please [give us some feedback](https://goo.gl/forms/7x1EsGWqgurucvne2). If you prefer, you can still [access the old editor](https://code.quirkbot.com).
